prepaid.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if something is prepaid, it is paid for before it is needed or used
prepaid.translation[1].definitions[0].de: prepaid amounts are payments for things that you have not yet received
prepaid.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The pay phones are designed for phone cards and generate more than $2 billion in prepaid revenues.
prepaid.translation[1].definitions[1].de: a prepaid loan is repaid to the lender before the normal time
prepaid.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: The loan for the dam was prepaid after criticisms of the way the project was financed.
prepaid.translation[1].definitions[2].de: a prepaid letter, envelope etc is one where the sender does not have to use a stamp
prepaid.translation[1].definitions[3].de: prepaid insurance contracts are to pay for services that may be needed by the insured person in the future
prepaid.translation[1].definitions[3].ex: Everyone has legal needs and the latest option is a prepaid package from Midwest Legal Services.
